com.nsqre.insquare.Square

Class RecyclerProfileSquareAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter
      • com.nsqre.insquare.Square.RecyclerProfileSquareAdapter

  • public class RecyclerProfileSquareAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter
    Created by Umberto Sonnino on 29/03/2016. This is the adapter that handles the information visible in the Created Section of the BottomNavActivity
